responseText: So, that man Martin Swift intends to make a museum? Perhaps I misread him after all. A place of reflection upon the histories of our peoples intertwined as they are, would be a boon to all of us. Don't you think? Far better than the one-sided narrative sure to be enshrined by a Kaelar working alone. This gives me much to think on. Thank you. If you find more artifacts of my people, please keep me in mind - I'd like to safeguard them until such time that I can bring them to the museum myself, to safeguard their story.
name: SQ_RVR_NPC_Samias_Miraleth_Sabah_35_Response
